title: How high are the receipts from the EU budget in 2023?
subtitle: As of 2023 the average receipts are as high as 5.3 billion €.
textNote: Among the beneficiaries, the top five included Poland alongside the EU's 'Big Four'. France received €16.5bn, followed by Poland (€14.1bn), then Germany (€14bn), Italy (€12.8bn), and Spain (€12.1bn). Luxembourg is not visualized and receives a per month per person of 312€.
